title: Hows does the player ranking work in the post game stats?
body:
I just had a game before where we completely steamrolled the other team, I ended with a score of **14/1/7** and 116 cs after 24 minutes. I got an A+ ranking for this, and I always thought the S ranking was for an insanely good score, but the Rumble on my team got an S- with something like **6/0/7** and 160 cs.

Why would he get a better score than I did, and what exactly gets you an S rating?

replies.body:
it compares you with the average for THAT champion. 6-0 Rumble might be S, but a 6-0 Jinx would be A-

Also S+ is the highest rating

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=mP5We3AQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-08T10:29:22.595+0000)
>
> it compares you with the average for THAT champion. 6-0 Rumble might be S, but a 6-0 Jinx would be A-
> 
> Also S+ is the highest rating

That would make a lot of sense actually, ADC is meant to have an epic score, Rumble (whatever he is) would be more of a team player.
Yeah, also as a support I think it is easier to get a higher rank since you will have a ton of assists (usually).
its really not hard to see why he got the better score with those comparisons. i think the most obvious one would be because he didnt die and he still contributed to the team, (somehow, with assists)
So... I died *once* and that outbalances the 8 kills I had on him? That makes no sense at all.

thats a potential of 500 gold being given freely to the enemy team, and even more if you count the time you wasted being dead. in the nitty gritty, all deaths count for something big, and nothing is bigger between 0 and 1 deaths

When you put it that way, it does make some sense. Your first post didn't put more emphasis on the fact that he didn't die, which sounds stupid as a pure bullet point. But still, 8 kills doesn't make up for a 500 gold bounty given?

That's a decent reason as to me getting an A+ instead of an S-, but why did Rumble get an S- with that score? Yes, he didn't die, but does that really make up for all the gold I got (and my team) from an extra 8 kills?

yeah fook my first post m8. i dont agree with the system ultimately. ULTIMATELY. so above all else, there is no possible way to truly grade someones performances with a computerised system. but if you had to make a system, no deaths and participating in takedowns should be more greatly awarded than a bunch of kills that couldve just been ks's (im sure they arent) but yeah like, otherwise you'd see katarinas always being higher grades than sustain supports like soraka/sona/nami
